Description: A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night
An Iron Collar can save you from a single lynch.
A Potion of Inebriation can be used to make a player drunk for the rest of the game, giving them a chance to fail to use their night action

The Arcanum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated player votes will be slightly obscured, it will be not be known who the votes are cast by. Using the Arcanum will stop the village being able to not lynch
A Potion of Inebriation can be used to make a player drunk for the rest of the game, giving them a chance to fail to use their night action
A Potion of Tenacity can be used once to grant a player immunity from roleblocks tonight
A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night

DetailedDescription: A Potion of Desolation can be used once to destroy all the items that a player carries
There are some powerful relics that cannot be destroyed, such as the Heart of Fenrir
A Fj√§t Rune allows you to stalk a player at night to find out who they visit
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Confirmation: Tonight you will stop $Guihmo from using any night ability they have
Tonight you will use the Fj√§t Rune to check $Guihmo
Tonight you will stop $edgelord from using any night ability they have

Message: Morning
Hello there
Morning everyone
How quiet
Indeed. Concerningly quiet
Oh wow.
It is disconcertingly quiet
i assume people have had a busy day
Given we know nothing about the setup I think we perhaps no lynch today and then see if anyone has intel tomorrow?
D2 when there's no setup info is generally quieter
because people dont have anything to speculate about
Quite hard to say what we should do
Worst case is someone dies tonight. And given we started with 7 that could be concerning
I think it's *probably* a vampire
of some kind
but could also be a small wolfpack - perhaps a single wolf and a damned player?
dunno, no real way to tell at this point
If someone was diseased that would give an indication, but probably not worth revealing that info at this point
but bear in mind that if you're diseased then your very existence might be a clue to what we're facing
Hmmm
I'll leave a vote here for now
same
But yeah... hopefully this picks up tomorrow
